trans-unit.source: Represents a binding to a window handle that supports visual composition.
trans-unit.target: 表示一种绑定到支持视觉构成的窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndTarget"></xref> class, using the specified HWND.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndTarget"></xref>类，使用指定的 HWND。

trans-unit.source: The handle for the window that this object draws to.
trans-unit.target: 此对象绘制到的窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the window referenced by this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndTarget"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此引用的窗口的背景色<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndTarget"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn before any other visual component.
trans-unit.target: 在任何其他可视化组件之前绘制背景。

trans-unit.source: The color used must have an alpha component of 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 使用的颜色必须具有为 1.0 的 alpha 分量。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to specify a different alpha value in the provided <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>, it automatically resets to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试在提供指定不同的 alpha 值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>，它会自动重置为 1.0。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: The background color, as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 背景色，作为<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndTarget"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放使用的所有资源<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndTarget"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rendering mode for the window referenced by this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndTarget"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此引用的窗口的呈现模式<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndTarget"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.RenderMode"></xref> values that specifies the current render mode.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.RenderMode"></xref>值，该值指定当前呈现模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.RenderMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.RenderMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root visual object of the page that is hosted by the window.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在窗口托管的页面的根视觉对象。

trans-unit.source: The root visual object of the hosted page.
trans-unit.target: 托管的页面的根 visual 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a matrix that transforms the coordinates of the device that is associated with the rendering destination of this target.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个矩阵，转换的设备与此目标呈现目标相关联的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The transform matrix.
trans-unit.target: 转换矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Gets a matrix that transforms the coordinates of this target to the device that is associated with the rendering destination.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个矩阵，转换到与呈现目标相关联的设备的此目标的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The transform matrix.
trans-unit.target: 转换矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that declares whether the per-pixel opacity value of the source window content is used for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，声明的源窗口内容的每像素不透明度值是否用于呈现。

trans-unit.source: If you enable per-pixel opacity, the rendering subsystem no longer draws the non-client area (edge of window).
trans-unit.target: 如果启用每像素不透明度，呈现子系统不再绘制非工作区 （窗口边缘）。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if using per-pixel opacity; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用每像素不透明度;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
